summary: Small businesses owned by veterans, active military members, their spouses, and other military-affiliated people are an important part of the U.S. economy. We looked at some of their challenges and the resources available to them. Data shows that veterans can have trouble getting business financing from large banks. The Small Business Administration and Department of Agriculture offer loans to military-affiliated business owners. SBA lending to...
title: Financial Literacy and Small Business Lending: Resources Available to Military-Affiliated People
